acceptMatch.description: Grants permission to register player acceptance or rejection of a proposed FlexMatch match

claimGameServer.description: Grants permission to locate and reserve a game server to host a new game session

createAlias.description: Grants permission to define a new alias for a fleet

createBuild.description: Grants permission to create a new game build using files stored in an Amazon S3 bucket

createFleet.description: Grants permission to create a new fleet of computing resources to run your game servers

createFleetLocations.description: Grants permission to specify additional locations for a fleet

createGameServerGroup.description: Grants permission to create a new game server group, set up a corresponding Auto Scaling group, and launche instances to host game servers

createGameSession.description: Grants permission to start a new game session on a specified fleet

createGameSessionQueue.description: Grants permission to set up a new queue for processing game session placement requests

createMatchmakingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a new FlexMatch matchmaker

createMatchmakingRuleSet.description: Grants permission to create a new matchmaking rule set for FlexMatch

createPlayerSession.description: Grants permission to reserve an available game session slot for a player

createPlayerSessions.description: Grants permission to reserve available game session slots for multiple players

createScript.description: Grants permission to create a new Realtime Servers script

createVpcPeeringAuthorization.description: Grants permission to allow GameLift to create or delete a peering connection between a GameLift fleet VPC and a VPC on another AWS account

createVpcPeeringConnection.description: Grants permission to establish a peering connection between your GameLift fleet VPC and a VPC on another account

deleteAlias.description: Grants permission to delete an alias

deleteBuild.description: Grants permission to delete a game build

deleteFleet.description: Grants permission to delete an empty fleet

deleteFleetLocations.description: Grants permission to delete locations for a fleet

deleteGameServerGroup.description: Grants permission to permanently delete a game server group and terminate FleetIQ activity for the corresponding Auto Scaling group

deleteGameSessionQueue.description: Grants permission to delete an existing game session queue

deleteMatchmakingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete an existing FlexMatch matchmaker

deleteMatchmakingRuleSet.description: Grants permission to delete an existing FlexMatch matchmaking rule set

deleteScalingPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a set of auto-scaling rules

deleteScript.description: Grants permission to delete a Realtime Servers script

deleteVpcPeeringAuthorization.description: Grants permission to cancel a VPC peering authorization

deleteVpcPeeringConnection.description: Grants permission to remove a peering connection between VPCs

deregisterGameServer.description: Grants permission to remove a game server from a game server group

describeAlias.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for an alias

describeBuild.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for a game build

describeEC2InstanceLimits.description: Grants permission to retrieve the maximum allowed and current usage for EC2 instance types

describeFleetAttributes.description: Grants permission to retrieve general properties, including status, for fleets

describeFleetCapacity.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current capacity setting for fleets

describeFleetEvents.description: Grants permission to retrieve entries from a fleet's event log

describeFleetLocationAttributes.description: Grants permission to retrieve general properties, including statuses, for a fleet's locations

describeFleetLocationCapacity.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current capacity setting for a fleet's location

describeFleetLocationUtilization.description: Grants permission to retrieve utilization statistics for fleet's location

describeFleetPortSettings.description: Grants permission to retrieve the inbound connection permissions for a fleet

describeFleetUtilization.description: Grants permission to retrieve utilization statistics for fleets

describeGameServer.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for a game server

describeGameServerGroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for a game server group

describeGameServerInstances.description: Grants permission to retrieve the status of EC2 instances in a game server group

describeGameSessionDetails.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for game sessions in a fleet, including the protection policy

describeGameSessionPlacement.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a game session placement request

describeGameSessionQueues.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for game session queues

describeGameSessions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for game sessions in a fleet

describeInstances.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about instances in a fleet

describeMatchmaking.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of matchmaking tickets

describeMatchmakingConfigurations.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for FlexMatch matchmakers

describeMatchmakingRuleSets.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for FlexMatch matchmaking rule sets

describePlayerSessions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for player sessions in a game session

describeRuntimeConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current runtime configuration for a fleet

describeScalingPolicies.description: Grants permission to retrieve all scaling policies that are applied to a fleet

describeScript.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for a Realtime Servers script

describeVpcPeeringAuthorizations.description: Grants permission to retrieve valid VPC peering authorizations

describeVpcPeeringConnections.description: Grants permission to retrieve details on active or pending VPC peering connections

getGameSessionLogUrl.description: Grants permission to retrieve the location of stored logs for a game session

getInstanceAccess.description: Grants permission to request remote access to a specified fleet instance

listAliases.description: Grants permission to retrieve all aliases that are defined in the current region

listBuilds.description: Grants permission to retrieve all game build in the current region

listFleets.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of fleet IDs for all fleets in the current region

listGameServerGroups.description: Grants permission to retrieve all game server groups that are defined in the current region

listGameServers.description: Grants permission to retrieve all game servers that are currently running in a game server group

listScripts.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for all Realtime Servers scripts in the current region

listTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to retrieve tags for GameLift resources

putScalingPolicy.description: Grants permission to create or update a fleet auto-scaling policy

registerGameServer.description: Grants permission to notify GameLift FleetIQ when a new game server is ready to host gameplay

requestUploadCredentials.description: Grants permission to retrieve fresh upload credentials to use when uploading a new game build

resolveAlias.description: Grants permission to retrieve the fleet ID associated with an alias

resumeGameServerGroup.description: Grants permission to reinstate suspended FleetIQ activity for a game server group

searchGameSessions.description: Grants permission to retrieve game sessions that match a set of search criteria

startFleetActions.description: Grants permission to resume auto-scaling activity on a fleet after it was suspended with StopFleetActions()

startGameSessionPlacement.description: Grants permission to send a game session placement request to a game session queue

startMatchBackfill.description: Grants permission to request FlexMatch matchmaking to fill available player slots in an existing game session

startMatchmaking.description: Grants permission to request FlexMatch matchmaking for one or a group of players and initiate game session placement

stopFleetActions.description: Grants permission to suspend auto-scaling activity on a fleet

stopGameSessionPlacement.description: Grants permission to cancel a game session placement request that is in progress

stopMatchmaking.description: Grants permission to cancel a matchmaking or match backfill request that is in progress

suspendGameServerGroup.description: Grants permission to temporarily stop FleetIQ activity for a game server group

tagResource.description: Grants permission to tag GameLift resources

untagResource.description: Grants permission to untag GameLift resources

updateAlias.description: Grants permission to update the properties of an existing alias

updateBuild.description: Grants permission to update an existing build's metadata

updateFleetAttributes.description: Grants permission to update the general properties of an existing fleet

updateFleetCapacity.description: Grants permission to adjust a fleet's capacity settings

updateFleetPortSettings.description: Grants permission to adjust a fleet's port settings

updateGameServer.description: Grants permission to change game server properties, health status, or utilization status

updateGameServerGroup.description: Grants permission to update properties for game server group, including allowed instance types

updateGameSession.description: Grants permission to update the properties of an existing game session

updateGameSessionQueue.description: Grants permission to update properties of an existing game session queue

updateMatchmakingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update properties of an existing FlexMatch matchmaking configuration

updateRuntimeConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update how server processes are configured on instances in an existing fleet

updateScript.description: Grants permission to update the metadata and content of an existing Realtime Servers script

validateMatchmakingRuleSet.description: Grants permission to validate the syntax of a FlexMatch matchmaking rule set
